title: James Galway Program 5
brief_description: James Galway introduces the cellist Julian Lloyd Webber, with Peter Pettinger on piano to perform “Arioso in G” by Bach, “Schezzetto” by Bridge, “Elegaic” by Faure, “Gavotte No 2” by Popper, “In the Holy Light” by W Lloyd Webber, and “Ritual Fire Dance” by Manuel de Falla. Rated: G
